oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Imdād dhawī al-istiʻdād li-sulūk maslak al-sadād / taḥrīr ʻAbd Allāh Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan ibn Shihāb al-Dīn al-Kurdī al-Kūrānī al-Shahrazūrī al-Shahrānī al-Madanī : manuscript, 1685
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kūrānī, Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan , 1616 or 1617-approximately 1690
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black and red.
Cream laid paper with watermarks. 21.3 x 15.1 cm. (15.3 x 9 cm.).
According to the colophon (f. 74r), copy completed on 5 Ṣafar 1096 AH [January 11, 1685 AD].
With: Maslak al-sadād ilá masʼalat khalq afʻāl al-ʻibād / taḥrīr ʻAbd Allāh Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan ibn Shihāb al-Dīn al-Kurdī al-Kūrānī al-Shahrazūrī al-Madanī (ff. 1v-26r).
MS Arab 251. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islam--Doctrines
Shafiites
Hadith
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: امداد ذوي الاستعداد لسلوك مسلك السداد / تحرير عبد الله إبراهيم بن حسن بن شهاب الدين الكردي الكوراني الشهرزوري الشهراني المدني : مخطوطة، 1685
